text: ebævin api ovun kerehi (pæmini danduvame) napuru dinayanhi darunu suli sulangak yava avaman genadena danduvama melova jivitayedima ovun vindina lesata sælæssuvemu. (ovunta) paralovadi æti danduvama nam, (meyata vada) itamat avaman gena dennak vanneya. (ehidi kisivekutat) ovunta udav karanu nolabannaha
